'''1.19.72''' is a hotfix to [[Bedrock Edition|''Bedrock Edition'']] released only for PlayStation on March 20, 2023, which fixes a bug.<ref>{{cite|url=https://feedback.minecraft.net/hc/en-us/articles/14147067613197|title=Minecraft - 1.19.72 (Bedrock)|website=Minecraft Feedback|date=March 20, 2023}}</ref>

==Fixes==
*Fixed an issue that prevented purchasing or renewing Realms on PlayStation.
